collection.title: 1. Information Collection
collection.description: When you use DineMate services, we may collect the following information:
items: Personal identification information: name, email address, phone number
Profile information: avatar, bio, food preferences
Location information: to match nearby dinners (with your authorization)
Usage information: app usage records, device information

usage.title: 2. Information Usage
usage.description: We use the collected information to:
items: Provide and improve our services
Match suitable dinners and users
Send important notifications and updates
Ensure platform security and prevent fraud

sharing.title: 3. Information Sharing
sharing.description: We will not sell, trade, or transfer your personal information to third parties, except when:
items: We have your explicit consent
Required by law or government agencies
To protect our rights, property, or safety

security.title: 4. Data Security
security.description: We adopt industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information, including data encryption, access control, and regular security audits.

rights.title: 5. Your Rights
items: Access and update your personal information
Delete your account and related data
Restrict or object to certain data processing
Data portability

contact.title: 6. Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact us through the following methods:

description.title: 1. Service Description
description.content: DineMate ("we", "platform") is a social dining platform that provides services for users to publish and participate in dining activities. By using our services, you agree to comply with these terms of service.

responsibilities.title: 2. User Responsibilities
responsibilities.description: As a platform user, you need to:
items: Provide true and accurate personal information
Take responsibility for content you publish
Respect other users, no harassment or malicious behavior
Comply with local laws and regulations
Fulfill your commitment to participate in dining activities on time

rules.title: 3. Platform Rules
rules.description: To maintain a good community environment, we prohibit:
items: Publishing false information or conducting fraudulent activities
Publishing illegal, harmful or inappropriate content
Maliciously canceling committed dining activities
Harassing or threatening other users
Using automated tools or bots

cancellation.title: 4. Cancellation Policy
cancellation.description: To protect the interests of all users, we have established the following cancellation policy:
items: Cancel 24+ hours in advance: no restrictions
Cancel within 24 hours: will affect credit record
Multiple consecutive last-minute cancellations: may be restricted from publishing new activities

disclaimer.title: 5. Disclaimer
items: Is not responsible for offline dining activities between users
Does not guarantee the accuracy of all information
Is not liable for any losses arising from using the service
Recommends users pay attention to personal and property safety during dining

changes.title: 6. Service Changes
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify, suspend or terminate services at any time. Major changes will be notified to users in advance.

disputes.title: 7. Dispute Resolution
disputes.content: Disputes arising from the use of this service should first be resolved through friendly consultation. If consultation fails, it shall be submitted to the People's Court of Dongguan City, Guangdong Province for jurisdiction.

contact.title: 8. Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about the terms of service, please contact us:

about.title: About DineMate
about.subtitle: Connecting food, sharing happiness. Making every meal a beautiful memory.
about.description: DineMate is a platform focused on social dining, dedicated to helping people discover like-minded partners and enjoy food together. Whether you want to meet new friends, explore local cuisine, or organize an interesting gathering, DineMate can provide you with the perfect solution.
about.mission: We believe that sharing food is not just about satisfying taste buds, but also an important way to build relationships and spread warmth. Through our platform, you can easily find nearby dining activities or initiate your own food gatherings.

help.title: Help Center
help.subtitle: Frequently asked questions and user guides

items.question: How to publish a dinner?
items.answer: Click the publish dinner button on the homepage, fill in dinner details including time, location, participant limit, food preferences, etc., then submit for review.

items.question: How to join a dinner?
items.answer: Browse the dinner list on the discover page, click on interesting dinners to view details, then click the join button. The dinner creator will receive a notification.

items.question: Can I cancel a dinner I joined?
items.answer: Yes, but we recommend notifying 24 hours in advance. Frequent last-minute cancellations may affect your credit rating and limit future participation rights.

items.question: How to set food preferences?
items.answer: You can set your food preferences and restrictions on your profile page. The system will recommend more suitable dinners based on this information.

items.question: What safety measures are there?
items.answer: We recommend dining in public places, protecting personal privacy information, and contacting customer service immediately if there are any abnormal situations. The platform records user behavior to maintain community safety.

items.question: How to contact other users?
items.answer: After joining a dinner, you can communicate with other participants through the in-platform chat function to discuss dining arrangements and share food experiences.

items.question: What to do if my account is restricted?
items.answer: If your account is restricted due to multiple last-minute cancellations, please contact customer service to explain the situation. We will handle it based on specific circumstances.

items.question: How to delete my account?
items.answer: If you need to delete your account, please send an email to weishang99@gmail.com, and we will process your request within 7 working days.

safety.title: Safety Tips
tips: Choose public places for dining, avoid private residences
Don't reveal too much personal privacy information
Recommend informing friends of dining arrangements
Maintain rational consumption to avoid disputes
